forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 66. West wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 48. Southwest wind 6 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
As the dawn breaks over Boston, the city awakens beneath a canvas of mostly sunny skies, promising a day of clarity and gentle breezes. With the sun treading a tranquil path, temperatures will gracefully rise toward a comfortable mid-60s. The west wind, a playful companion, may dance around at seventeen miles per hour, occasionally gusting a little firmer—just enough to rustle the leaves and suggest a whisper of adventure. As night falls, the warmth will give way to cooler climes, settling to the crispness of the high 40s, where a southwest breeze offers a gentle reminder of the day that was.

In such splendid conditions, one might wander along the esplanade or sip coffee outside a local café, enjoying the warm embrace of sunlight. Light layers will suffice, perhaps a sweater to wrap around shoulders for the evening. Make your way to the parks or simply stroll through quiet streets, absorbing the essence of early June in a city alive with possibility. It is an ideal day for both the contemplative and the curious, a chance to blend productivity with leisure, as the vibrancy of Boston beckons ever so softly.
